function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adaptive implementation of tailored programmes in the health system","Impact":"Ineffective containment of zoonotic schistosomiasis, leading to increased spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Implementing tailored programmes within the existing health system and collaborating with other implementing partners","Technologies":"Adaptive implementation frameworks, collaboration platforms for health systems","People":"Local communities, health care workers, public health officials","Owner":"Local health authorities, implementing partners, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Increase in the range of local snail host due to changes in the marshland ecosystem and sociodemographic shifts","Impact":"Expansion of the disease transmission cycle and higher risk of infection","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to regulate the snail host population and ecosystem changes, targeted control interventions","Technologies":"Ecosystem surveillance technologies, snail host population control methods","People":"Local environmental agencies, public health organizations","Owner":"Environmental authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Re-emergence of the disease due to the completion of the Three Gorges Dam","Impact":"Resurgence of schistosomiasis outbreaks in the region","Mitigation":"Planning and implementing targeted interventions to address the predicted re-emergence, surveillance and monitoring of disease spread","Technologies":"Predictive modeling tools, disease surveillance systems","People":"Public health officials, local communities, researchers","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions"}]}
